column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday April 11 at 4:00 p.m.

column5: All inbound lanes shutdown.  One outbound lane open.

column3: UK Blue-White Game / Nicholasville Rd Traffic Pattern:
column4: On Friday April 12, Nicholasville Rd will have two lanes open in each direction during afternoon rush hour.

column3: UK Blue-White Game / Nicholasville Rd Traffic Pattern:
column4: The regular rush hour traffic pattern will not be in effect.  Motorists can expect long delays between 4 p.m. and 6 p.m.
